comments.body:
(work in progress, activation through PM config currently missing)

This patch adds the "adoption" functionality, but leaves the choice of where to move the nodes to the caller.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 2.4 branch in revision 1232414. It'll be useful to have this already in 2.4.0.

description: The optional ConsistencyChecker API on persistence managers allows analyzing and fixing storage inconsistencies. The current fixup code though does not attempt to "adopt" orphaned nodes.
summary: extend ConsistencyChecker API to allow adoption of orphaned nodes to a to-be-specified parent node
